Title: Long Live Ghosts!
Writer: Zdenek Sverák (screenplay), Oldrich Lipský (screenplay), Jirí Melísek (screenplay)
Actors: Dana Vávrová, Jirí Procházka, Jirí Sovák, Vlastimil Brodský
Plot: Trespassing gang of boys encounter a ghost in the ruins of a castle. When they rescue the ghost who is caught in a trapset, they become allies in a fight to prevent ruins from being turned into mushroom farm by the city authorities.
